import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../../../Css/Train.css' const history = useHistory(); class Train extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state={ Trains:[] } this.changeRoute=this.changeRoute.bind(this) } componentDidMount(){ const data = history.location.state.data; this.setState({ Trains: data }) console.log(this.state.Trains) } changeRoute(){ let path = `/Payment`; this.props.history.push(path) } render() { return (
